UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structural and biological characterization of shortened derivatives of the cathelicidin PMAP-36.
Literature.Author: Biondi B, de Pascale L, Mardirossian M, Di Stasi A, Favaro M, Scocchi M, Peggion C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=2µM)
